titleStmt.title: His Maiesties last declaration to all his loving subjects, especially the inhabitants of the citie of London shewing his royall intentions concerning the finall conclusion of these wars, and an agreement between himselfe and his high court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
